answerText: Katherina [accept Kate][10] Kate's suitor is this man, who comes to Padua in search of a wealthy woman. He later becomes Kate's husband.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | VCU + Michigan State  | 13 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Name some characters from The Taming of the Shrew, for 10 points each: [10] This character, the "shrew" of the title, is the daughter of Baptista Minola and sister of Bianca.
